title: JSON schema for JSHint configuration files

___maxlen.description: Max number of characters per line

___newcap.description: Require capitalization of all constructor functions e.g. `new F()`

___validthis.description: Tolerate using this in a non-constructor function

___boss.description: Tolerate assignments where comparisons would be expected

___immed.description: Require immediate invocations to be wrapped in parens e.g. `(function () { } ());`

___indent.description: Number of spaces to use for indentation

___latedef.description: Require variables/functions to be defined before being used

___smarttabs.description: Tolerate mixed tabs/spaces when used for alignment

___strict.description: Requires all functions run in ES5 Strict Mode

___moz.description: Allow Mozilla specific syntax (extends and overrides esnext features)

___unused.description: Require all defined variables be used

___maxdepth.description: Max depth of nested blocks (within functions)

___shadow.description: Allows re-define variables later in code e.g. `var x=1; x=2;`

___maxparams.description: Max number of formal params allowed per function

___lastsemic.description: Tolerate omitting a semicolon for the last statement of a 1-line block

___forin.description: Require filtering for..in loops with obj.hasOwnProperty()

___sub.description: Tolerate using `[]` notation when it can still be expressed in dot notation

___curly.description: Require {} for every new block or scope

___funcscope.description: Tolerate defining variables inside control statements

___es5.description: Allow ES5 syntax (ex: getters and setters)

___undef.description: Require all non-global variables to be declared (prevents global leaks)

___debug.description: Allow debugger statements e.g. browser breakpoints

___loopfunc.description: Tolerate functions being defined in loops

___nonew.description: Prohibit use of constructors for side-effects (without assignment)
